channel.title: Login problems
channel.description:
Hello All..
my server is done now and i did all the things i needed to do
but no1 can conect to my server only on my hamachi IP
5.87.102.133 that one works and
.......no-ip.biz doesn't how ?
how can i let them conect on my normal ip?
please help me

item.title: Login problems
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

lol added pic to my explaination above ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Login problems
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“Owner Stijn Scape, post:4, topic:242921”][quote author=RaZoR36 link=topic=319247.msg2529939#msg2529939 date=1226405978]
well ugh i might be able to help on this one. have you got a source? if you do u might needa click runserver if u dont have a run.bat (which runs ur server) u should probable get one if u cant get it to come up download latest java make sure the people that wanna get on r connected to ur hamachi network, and make sure ur connected to it then when ur connected to it click ur run.bat and it should say examplescape online something like that (no urs will prob be richscape i just used examplescape as an example) hope this helped u.
[/quote]

no it didn’t

i got a IP

called stijn-scape.no-ip.biz

but no1 can conect to it

they only can conect to my hamachi ip…

how do i fix it so they can connect on stijn scape ip?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 11, 2008,[/quote]

have u downloaded no-ip? + no advertising ur server ip,

Read full topic

item.title: Login problems
item.dc:creator: @Doom32dd Doom32dd
item.description:
@Doom32dd wrote:

well when you made the hamachi, did you make the ip of your hamachi and not your regular default gateway?

PIC

also

no advertising??

kihomura:

Please do not post your server IP on these forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Login problems
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

well ugh i might be able to help on this one. have you got a source? if you do u might needa click runserver if u dont have a run.bat (which runs ur server) u should probable get one if u cant get it to come up download latest java make sure the people that wanna get on r connected to ur hamachi network, and make sure ur connected to it then when ur connected to it click ur run.bat and it should say examplescape online something like that (no urs will prob be richscape i just used examplescape as an example) hope this helped u.
